title: Perform Database Schema Migration
description: A new product version requires a database schema migration that must be applied during a scheduled maintenance window.

tasks.description: Announce the scheduled maintenance on the status page and in-app.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent informs customers of the upcoming downtime.

tasks.description: During the maintenance window, run the pre-approved database migration script.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully executes the schema migration.

tasks.description: Perform post-migration data integrity checks to ensure no data was lost or corrupted.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent runs validation queries and confirms data integrity.

tasks.description: Bring the application back online and remove the maintenance page.
